name: Tristan Brito
coverLetter:
I have recently came across your job listing on Craigslist on hiring a trimmer. I am very interested in the position. I have recently moved from the tristate area here to California. I graduated at my university in May with a degree in Psychology. I have always been interested in learning more about medical marijuana in affects towards psychological matters. I think I would be a perfect fit for your company in sense of wanting to continue to learn more of the product and really making a difference in peopleâ€™s lives with cannabis. 

My availability is very open, night shift and weekends available.
